name: StuckInTheLabDownload
description:
You're trapped in lab: alone, in the dark, and with a crystal that can manipulate time.  Every 60 seconds, time get re-winded back 60 seconds, putting you back at the start of the game. Everything (doors, safes, lockers) resets, except for your knowledge of key-card locations and combination to safes.  Can you get out, or will you be forever trapped in the infinite loop?

To play: Once you downloaded the game, unzip into a folder and launch the application.

Controls:

Move -  WASD

Look -  Mouse

Interact (open doors, open safes) - Left Click
